author: travelandtourworld.com
title: YOUR CAR HIRE On Cloud NineTravelandtourworld.com
text:
YOUR CAR HIRE On Cloud Nine  
Ruth Bligh, managing director, said “We wanted to take full advantage of the very latest industry developments and cloud technology.
 
‘As you would expect, it does everything an agent needs including one ways, displays on/off airport suppliers, fuel policies and supplier preferences. As importantly the system will adapt to changes agents and suppliers may want in the future”
 
Steve Whiston, product and solutions director of Cloud-works commented ‘The new reservation system, built from the ground up, is a dedicated B2B broker solution using the very latest Microsoft technologies. It is both flexible and scalable. The cloud-based system gives Your Car Hire the potential to expand and extend their range, whilst retaining the ability to respond quickly to agent and operator needs. The multi-distribution capability means that Your Car Hire can have new partners up and running in an instant.
 
To celebrate the launch of the new online booking system Your Car Hire are giving you the opportunity to win £100.00 worth of vouchers simply by making three bookings on the new online platform. Use the new features to book a delivery , a one way rental and a straight forward everyday booking online and you will be entered into the prize draw.
 
 
Source:- IAGTO
